amendment.description: To improve oversight over the program and ensure no subsidy is received by Senators and employees.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2155 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2155 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S3657; text: CR S3657) To improve oversight over the program and ensure no subsidy is received by Senators and employees.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2155 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Levin.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2155 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
